title: Katie Price will spill on her love life if you take her away ‘somewhere nice’
text:
Katie Price will spill on her love life if you take her on free holiday (Picture: ITV/REX)

Katie Price will spill on her love life if someone takes her away to some place nice – for free.

Yes, it seems as though there’s a price on Pricey.

The 41-year-old has revealed that she’ll open up on what goes on behind closed doors in exchange for a glossy photoshoot.

When chatting to her close friend Rick Live on Flex FM, the reality star insisted that what goes on in her life is her own business before saying the goss will come out in time.

Talking directly to the media, she then added: ‘If you want to know the truth, get in touch and I’ll do a Q&A.

‘I’ll do a glossy photoshoot, whoever comes up with the most money – it’s all about the Pricey Pricey money.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

We bet it is!

There’s a price on Pricey (Picture: Rex)

The mother-of-five continued to tease that she might even bring a man along if the outlet was lucky enough.

She joked: ‘Who knows, if there’s a man, you might get a photoshoot with him – if there’s a man.’

But it’s not just a glammed-up photoshoot she is hoping for, as the former glamour model also said she would settle for a free holiday.

‘Or take me away somewhere nice so I can wear a bikini,’ Katie joked: ‘I can do a nice glossy photoshoot to reveal all.’

The star recently had a nude shoot with Kris Boyson (Picture: Kris Boyson/Instagram)

She’s asked for a glossy photoshoot (Picture: GC Images)

This isn’t the first time the star has confessed to setting up staged pictures for money, as she recently revealed she would get paps to take certain shoots after those topless pictures with her ex-fiance Kris Boyson.

When chatting on BBC Woman’s Hour, Katie confessed: ‘You would know, I never set up pictures, I’m not one for that because people got them.

‘But it’s got to the point where you want to set them up so people don’t take them off you and write what they like.’

The Loose Women panelist added: ‘I’m going to say one thing, I do have a relationship with the media, but at the same time, I am a human being and some people do have a right and you’re allowed your privacy.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Yes you can’t pick and choose, that’s part and part, you’re either in the industry or you’re out.

‘These days, back in the day, no, but these days a lot of people do set up the pictures as they’ll get rid of the paps that will try and intrude on you. It gives you a bit of control.’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Katie Price will spill on her love life if you take her away 'somewhere nice'.
